text:
e="preserve">Lars-Åke Lagrell (20 January 1940 – 21 September 2020) was a Swedish sports personality. He was born near Växjö, Sweden. He was the president of the Swedish Football Association between 1991 and 2012.
In 2002 Prime Minister of Sweden Göran Persson appointed him Governor of Kronoberg County. He left the office in 2006.
Lagrell died on 21 September 2020 at the age of 80.
